thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Katrina
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Katrina

author: Katrina
title: Katrina
text: My mistake, i ordered the wrong glasses. I picked it up immediately and tried to cancel. I used the chat help, she ordered the correct ones for me. ( or so I was told ) Apparently the original order was still sent and they are now out of stock of the ones I wanted. Oh and the best bit is I am still awaiting the glasses, that i don't want, which were mistakenly ordered on the 27 of feb. I really wanted this to work out and didn't order lenses as I was skeptical. Lucky, who knows what i would have ended up with.
